title: UPPER LEVEL BOASTS BRAND NEW CARPET THROUGHOUT, AN OWNER SUITE, TWO CL
posting_body: Beautifully maintained Colonial on over 3 private acres in a peaceful area with NO HOA.
The traditional floor plan welcomes you with a formal dining room and formal living room.
Kitchen w/ brand new luxury vinyl flooring, oak cabinets and enormous walk-in pantry that you have to see to believe.
Large island and table space w/ door leading to the deck that overlooks the private pool.
Family Room w/ Gas Fireplace and two story ceiling.
Main level office or bedroom with a full bath.
and relaxing owners bath w/ jetted tub, separate shower and two sinks.
Bedroom 2 and 3 share a jack and jill bath.
Bedroom 2 has its own en suite bathroom.
Lower level is finished w/ recreation area and wet bar, craft room, additional game room/bedroom, full bathroom and storage room.
The home has been painted throughout (2022), brand new carpet (2022), Luxury Vinyl Flooring (2022) and both HVAC units are new as of 2018.
Don’t let this rare opportunity pass you by.
